meanings.definition: A photograph or image produced by autoradiography.
meanings.sent1: The autoradiogram showed where the radioactive material was located.
meanings.sent2: Scientists analyzed the autoradiogram to understand the distribution of radioactivity.
meanings.sent3: The autoradiogram looked like a map of tiny glowing stars.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an autoradiogram, each thought shining brightly in its own unique way.
meanings.sent5: The autoradiogram revealed the hidden secrets of the experiment with its glowing patterns.

meanings.definition: To produce a photograph or image using autoradiography.
meanings.sent1: They autoradiogramed the sample to visualize the radioactive elements.
meanings.sent2: She autoradiogramed the tissue to track the movement of the tracer.
meanings.sent3: He autoradiogramed with such precision that even the smallest details were captured.
meanings.sent4: Autoradiograming the cells was like painting with light on a microscopic canvas.
meanings.sent5: The scientist carefully autoradiogramed each slide, eager to see the results of the experiment.
